title: My Kitchen Rules NZ: Week 3
content:encoded:
Things are starting off a little differently this week, and we're not just talking about Pascal and Vikki's gin-soaked salmon. After a very big little announcement, it is back into MKRNZ for the final instant restaurant and a big public barbecue. Gatecrashers! Tuna! And the truth about Jim Corr! We're sorry so much.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
